events.name: BatchShipped
events.description: Tracks the event of a batch being shipped to customers.

events.name: BatchReceived
events.description: Records the acceptance of a batch upon arrival at the destination.

events.name: ColdChainAlertTriggered
events.description: Notifies relevant parties if the cold chain temperature deviates from the acceptable range.

events.name: BatchInspectionFailed
events.description: Logs instances where a batch fails inspection, requiring further action.

commands.name: ShipBatch
commands.description: Tracks the event of a batch being shipped to customers.

commands.name: ReceiveBatch
commands.description: Records the acceptance of a batch upon arrival at the destination.

commands.name: TriggerColdChainAlert
commands.description: Notifies relevant parties if the cold chain temperature deviates from the acceptable range.

commands.name: FailBatchInspection
commands.description: Logs instances where a batch fails inspection, requiring further action.

integrationPoints.name: Logistics
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the logistics system to handle shipping and receiving of batches.

integrationPoints.name: QualityControl
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the quality control system for inspections and alerts.
